product_name: Gigabyte AORUS NVMe Gen4 M.2 1TB SSD
description: The Gigabyte AORUS NVMe Gen4 SSD offers lightning-fast data speeds with PCIe 4.0 support. With a 1TB capacity, it's perfect for gaming and content creation. It boasts read speeds of up to 5000 MB/s and write speeds of up to 4400 MB/s. The M.2 2280 form factor ensures compatibility with modern motherboards and laptops.

product_name: Gigabyte UD Pro 512GB 2.5" SATA III SSD
description: The Gigabyte UD Pro 512GB SSD is a cost-effective upgrade for your PC or laptop. With SATA III support, it offers a capacity of 512GB. It delivers read speeds of up to 530 MB/s and write speeds of up to 500 MB/s. The 2.5-inch form factor makes it suitable for various devices.

The Gigabyte M.2 2280 256GB SSD is a compact and fast storage solution. With SATA III connectivity, it provides 256GB of storage. It offers read speeds of up to 500 MB/s and write speeds of up to 420 MB/s. The M.2 2280 form factor ensures compatibility with various devices.
